name: bleak
description: An in-your-face theme for the Ghost blogging platform
author: Jack Preston <unwttng@gmail.com>

scripts.update-on-production: git pull && npm install && npm run compile
scripts.watch: npm run compile && npm run watch-css
scripts.compile-css: npm run ensure-css && ./node_modules/.bin/node-sass --recursive --output assets/css/ --include-path src/scss/ --output-style nested src/scss/
scripts.watch-css: npm run ensure-css && ./node_modules/.bin/node-sass --recursive --output assets/css/ --include-path src/scss/ --output-style nested --watch src/scss/
